gw.pl.community.entity

Interface Organization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, IGosuObject, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, com.guidewire.pl.domain.community.gen.OrganizationStubI, Retireable, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, Versionable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OrganizationCoreExt

    public interface Organization
extends com.guidewire.pl.domain.community.gen.OrganizationStubI
    OrganizationBase Defines an organization that has a hierarchy of groups

    • Method Detail

      • isSafeToDelete

        boolean isSafeToDelete()
        Tests if the organization can be safely deleted. Returns false if
        • The organization is the carrier organization.
        • The organization has any users.
        • The root group of the organization cannot be safely deleted.
        Returns:
        True if the user can be safely deleted.

      • getAllUsers

        IQueryBeanResult<User> getAllUsers()
        Returns:
        All users in this tree of organization. Does not include users in child organization trees.

      • setNameAndRootGroupName

        void setNameAndRootGroupName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the organization to name and if the root group is non-null sets its name as well.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to set

      • isTemporary

        boolean isTemporary()
        Returns true if this is a temporary Organization.
        Returns:
        whether or not this is a temporary Organization.

      • getZonesString

        java.lang.String getZonesString()
        Returns the zones that t.
        Returns:
        a comma-separated string of the string codes of the zones that use this business week, in alphabetical order

      • setZonesString

        void setZonesString(java.lang.String zonesString)
        Sets the zones that use this business week.
        Parameters:
        zonesString - a comma-separated string of the string codes of the zones that use this business week

      • getZonesArray

        java.lang.String[] getZonesArray()
        Returns the business week's zones.
        Returns:
        an array of the codes of zones that use this business week (should be empty if AppliesToAllZones is true)

      • setZonesArray

        void setZonesArray(java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
        Sets the business week's zones. If there are elements in the input array, AppliesToAllZones will go to false.
        Parameters:
        zoneCodes - the codes of the zones to set

      • findZones

        Zone[] findZones(ZoneType zoneType,
               java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
        Sets the business week's zones. If there are elements in the input array, AppliesToAllZones will go to false.
        Parameters:
        zoneCodes - the codes of the zones to set

      • getZoneRange

        java.lang.String[] getZoneRange(ZoneType zoneType)
        Returns the available zones.
        Parameters:
        zoneType - the desired type of zones
        Returns:
        an array of the available zone codes

      • findVisibleZoneIds

        com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query findVisibleZoneIds()
        Returns the visible zones for this organization.
        Returns:
        an Query of the available zone codes

      • findVisibleZones

        com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query findVisibleZones(ZoneType zoneType)
        Returns the visible zones of the given zone type for this organization.
        Parameters:
        zoneType - the zone type
        Returns:
        an Query of the available zones of the given zone type

      • isZoneVisible

        boolean isZoneVisible(Country country,
                    ZoneType zoneType,
                    java.lang.String zoneCode)
        Determines if the input zone is visible to this organization.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneCode - the zone code
        Returns:
        true if the zone is visible to the organization and it exists in the zone lookup table, false otherwise.

      • findVisibleZoneCodes

        java.lang.String[] findVisibleZoneCodes(ZoneType zoneType,
                                      Zone linkedZone)
        Return an array of the zone codes of all zones that are of the specified type and linked to the specified zone and that are visible to this organization.
        Parameters:
        zoneType - the zone type
        linkedZone - the linked zone, can be null; it is assumed that the linked zone is visible to the organzation.
        Returns:
        an array of zone codes satisfying the above criteria.

      • hasZone

        boolean hasZone(java.lang.String zoneCode)
        Returns true if the provided zone is set as an AdminZone on this Organization.
        Parameters:
        zoneCode - the desired type of zones
        Returns:
        true if the zone exists for this Org

      • getCountries

        java.util.List<Country> getCountries()
        Returns the country to which this organization belongs. The country is defined by the zones on the organization. If no zones are defined for the organization, this returns the default country.
        Returns:
        the organization's country if one is defined, otherwise, the default country.
